title: Drawing, "Sideboard, Red Bakelite, Red Lacquer", August 22, 1932
medium: Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower left: R.C. 144/OLSSON/AUG 22-32; below stamp: Approved for construction/Gayle....(?)/R.S.S.; lower left corner: 2 LIKE THIS/#144
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for sideboard. Demi-lune shape of sideboard with squared back edges. Four stacked drawers at center; cabinets at left and right. Drawer pulls in double-vertical aluminum strips at left and right of drawers at center. Top in red bakelite, center drawers in red lacquer, low base in Micarta, sides in black lacquer with horizontal metal strips.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Sideboard, Red Bakelite, Red Lacquer", August 22, 1932.Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-653.
